text: Oni uyekhali, vzyav s soboy rubakhu, a Yakub tem vremenem s neterpeniyem zhdal vozvrashcheniya synovey. Allakh pomiloval yego i soyedinil yego dushu s ikh dushami. Kogda karavan pokinul Yegipet, Allakh vselil v yego serdtse nadezhdu, napolnil yego spokoystviyem i vnushil yemu, chto skoro pridot dobraya vest': Yusuf tsel i nevredim. On soobshchil ob etom svoim i skazal: "YA chuvstvuyu lyubimyy zapakh Yusufa. Yesli by ya ne boyalsya obvineniya v bezumii, ya by yeshcho bol'she soobshchil vam o nom
